name: Sink or Swim (itch) (isabelhenry)
description:
• Take on the perspective of a sea lion in a polluted ocean and try your best to collect food and stay alive.
  • Collection, steering controls, avoidance.

Made in Unity using 3D Flight kit

Created by Isabel Henry

A junior level student in game art, mainly focused on character art with an interest in environmental awareness.

Acknowledgements

  • CCAD Game art Pipeline Fall 2019
